languages.text: {n}Лицо дознавателя вытягивается от ваших слов, а на скулах вздуваются желваки.{/n} "Ахиллеас мертв, понеся должное наказание, пускай и не от рук Инквизиции. И довольно об этом".

{n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо дознавателя вытягивается от ваших слов, а на скулах вздуваются желваки.{/n} "Ахиллеас мертв, понеся должное наказание, пускай и не от рук Инквизиции. И довольно об этом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator's face falls, he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas had died after receiving due punishment, even if it wasn't from the Inquisition. And enough of that."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator's face falls, he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas had died after receiving due punishment, even if it wasn't from the Inquisition. And enough of that."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}听到你的话，海因里希浑身一僵，牙齿咬得咯咯作响。{/n}“即使没有受到审判庭的审判，阿吉里亚斯也已经在死前得到了应有的惩罚。这件事也该到此为止了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话，海因里希浑身一僵，牙齿咬得咯咯作响。{/n}“即使没有受到审判庭的审判，阿吉里亚斯也已经在死前得到了应有的惩罚。这件事也该到此为止了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al oír tus palabras, el interrogador se pone muy tenso y aprieta los dientes con furia.{/n} «Achilleas murió tras recibir su merecido castigo, aun cuando no fuese administrado por la Inquisición. No pienso discutir ese tema».
languages.original_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al oír tus palabras, el interrogador se pone muy tenso y aprieta los dientes con furia.{/n} «Achilleas murió tras recibir su merecido castigo, aun cuando no fuese administrado por la Inquisición. No pienso discutir ese tema».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}À ces mots, l'interrogateur se crispe et grince des dents.{/n} « Achilleas est mort après avoir reçu une juste punition, même si elle n'a pas été administrée par l'Inquisition. Le sujet est clos. »
languages.original_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}À ces mots, l'interrogateur se crispe et grince des dents.{/n} « Achilleas est mort après avoir reçu une juste punition, même si elle n'a pas été administrée par l'Inquisition. Le sujet est clos. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bei deinen Worten erstarrt der Interrogator und knirscht wütend mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Achilleas starb nach angemessener Strafe, wenn auch nicht durch die Hand der Inquisition. Ich will nichts mehr davon hören."
languages.original_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei deinen Worten erstarrt der Interrogator und knirscht wütend mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Achilleas starb nach angemessener Strafe, wenn auch nicht durch die Hand der Inquisition. Ich will nichts mehr davon hören."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉を聞いてインテロゲイターは硬直し、怒りに歯を食いしばる。{/n}「アキレアスは、異端審問庁の手によるものでなくとも、しかるべき罰を受けた後に死にました。これ以上聞く気はありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉を聞いてインテロゲイターは硬直し、怒りに歯を食いしばる。{/n}「アキレアスは、異端審問庁の手によるものでなくとも、しかるべき罰を受けた後に死にました。これ以上聞く気はありません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, sözlerini duyduktan sonra gerilip öfkeyle dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Achilleas, Engizisyon'un ellerinden olmasa da hak ettiği cezayı aldıktan sonra öldü. Bu konuda tek kelime daha duymak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Upon hearing your words, the Interrogator stiffens and he grits his teeth in anger.{/n} "Achilleas died after receiving due punishment, even if it was not at the hands of the Inquisition. I will hear no more about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, sözlerini duyduktan sonra geriliyor ve öfkeyle dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Achilleas, Engizisyon'un ellerinden olmasa da hak ettiği cezasını aldıktan sonra öldü. Bu konuda tek kelime daha duymak istemiyorum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
